changelog.zh:
- TV 端新增快进快退功能：左右键短按快进快退，长按持续加速
- 设置中新增快进快退跨度选项：5秒/10秒/30秒/60秒/120秒可选
- 优化按键操作：频道键长按切换源，左键双击打开分类面板
- 修复进度条显示逻辑，支持"总是显示"模式下的拖动操作
- 更新操作说明文档和界面提示
changelog.en:
- Added seek functionality for TV: Short press left/right to seek, long press for continuous seeking
- Added seek step duration setting: 5s/10s/30s/60s/120s options
- Optimized key operations: Long press channel keys to switch sources, double click left for category panel
- Fixed progress bar display logic, support dragging in 'always show' mode
- Updated control instructions in documentation and UI
